name: AstaZero AB
goal:
AstaZero is the world’s first full-scale independent test environment for future road safety. AstaZero has a test facility and R&D office in Sweden. Since 2018 certified for Euro NCAP testing of active safety and autonomous driving.

What is unique about the facility is that the different traffic environments make it possible to test advanced safety systems and their functions for all kinds of traffic and traffic situations. This enables research, development and certification of future road safety systems, and functions as an international arena open for vehicle manufacturers, suppliers, legislators, universities and colleges from throughout the world.

The name is a combination of ASTA Active Safety Test Area and Zero, which refers to the Swedish Parliament’s vision for road safety with zero dead and seriously injured in traffic.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives:
Active member of EARPA, the association of automotive R&D organisations.

Beneficiary in research projects under Horizon 2020.

EARTO member through our owners, RISE and Chalmers University of Technology.
